details.arabic_diacless: اللٰهم أنت ربي لا إلٰه إلا أنت، خلقتني وأنا عبدك
details.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّيْ لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ، خَلَقْتَنِيْ وَأَنَا عَبْدُكَ
details.translations: O Allaah, You are my Lord, none has the right to be worshipped except You, You created me and I am Your servant

details.arabic_diacless: وأنا على عهدك ووعدك ما استطعت، أعوذ بك من شر ما صنعت
details.arabic: وَأَنَا عَلَى عَهْدِكَ وَوَعْدِكَ مَا اسْتَطَعْتُ، أَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا صَنَعْتُ
details.transliteration: wa 'anaa 'alaa 'ahdika wa wa'dika mas-tata'tu, 'a'oothu bika min sharri maa sana'tu,
details.translations: and I abide to Your covenant and promise as best I can, I take refuge in You from the evil of which I have committed.

details.arabic_diacless: أبوء لك بنعمتك علي، وأبوء بذنبي
details.arabic: أَبُوْءُ لَكَ بِنِعْمَتِكَ عَلَيَّ، وَأَبُوْءُ بِذَنْبِيْ
details.translations: I acknowledge Your favour upon me and I acknowledge my sin,

details.arabic_diacless: فاغفر لي فإنه لا يغفر الذنوب إلا أنت
details.arabic: فَاغْفِرْ لِيْ فَإِنَّهُ لَا يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوْبَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ
details.translations: so forgive me, for verily none can forgive sin except You.
details.bottom: Whoever recites this with conviction in the evening and dies during that night shall enter Paradise, and whoever recites it with conviction in the morning and dies during that day shall enter Paradise

pageTitle: Sayyidinal Istighfar (Best way to ask forgiveness)
